U.S. House of Representatives Roll Call Votes
117th Congress - 1st Session (2021)
as compiled through the electronic voting machine
by the House Tally Clerks under the direction of the Clerk of the House

(Result designators are P for Passed, F for Failed, and A for Agreed To)

Roll Date Issue Question Result Title/Description
449 15-Dec S J RES 33 On Passage P Joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit
448 14-Dec H R 5665 On Passage P Combating International Islamophobia Act
447 14-Dec H RES 851 On Agreeing to the Resolution P Recommending that the House of Representatives find Mark Randall Meadows in contempt of Congress for refusal to comply with a subpoena duly issued by the Select Committee to Investigate the January 6th Attack on the United States Capitol
446 14-Dec H RES 852 On Agreeing to the Resolution P Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (S.J.Res.33) joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit
445 14-Dec H RES 852 On Ordering the Previous Question P Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (S.J.Res.33) joint resolution relating to increasing the debt limit
444 14-Dec H RES 849 On Agreeing to the Resolution P Providing for consideration of the (H.R. 5665) to establish in the Department of State the Office to Monitor and Combat Islamophobia, and for other purposes
443 14-Dec H RES 849 On Ordering the Previous Question P Providing for consideration of the (H.R. 5665) to establish in the Department of State the Office to Monitor and Combat Islamophobia, and for other purposes
442 14-Dec H RES 848 On Agreeing to the Resolution P Relating to the consideration of House Report 117-216 and an accompanying resolution
441 14-Dec H RES 848 On Ordering the Previous Question P Relating to the consideration of House Report 117-216 and an accompanying resolution
